preqs: MGX5985 or MGX9850 or seek Chief Examiner's approval before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGX5985, MGX9850} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGF5985, MGX5985, MGX9850} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MBA5708, MGF5702, MGX5551}

description: The interaction of external environment, organisational factors and strategic human resource management (SHRM) is examined from multiple perspectives. Topics may include strategic choices facing the organisation in the areas of business planning, building SHRM capabilities, transforming the HR function, and SHRM program evaluation. The implications of SHRM for organisational performance are examined.
